news.content:
Now, you can BE THE INTERNET by becoming a ThreeFold Farmer.

Electricity + Network + a 3Node = All that you need in order to grow the grid from your home or office â€“ and earn TFT. Provide new capacity on a secure, private, scalable, and sustainable peer-to-peer Internet!

  • âœ… Pre-Register today for your 3Node
  • ðŸ“š Learn more about ThreeFold Farming
news.excerpt: Now, you can BE THE INTERNET by becoming a ThreeFold Farmer.

previous.title: Update on the Binance Smart Chain Integration
previous.excerpt: We are happy to update that the BSC integration is going just as planned and next week, TFT will be available there.
